metadata.title: CVE-2024-38609 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mt76: connac: check for null before dereferencingThe wcid can be NULL. It should be checked for validity beforedereferencing it to avoid crash.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
